statements: SELECT * FROM experimental_results
SELECT experiment_name, measured_value FROM experimental_results ORDER BY measured_value DESC
SELECT researcher_name, experiment_date FROM experimental_results WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, experiment_name FROM experimental_results WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT MAX(measured_value) AS max_value FROM experimental_results
SELECT * FROM experimental_results WHERE measured_value > 50 ORDER BY experiment_date DESC, researcher_name ASC
SELECT experiment_name, AVG(measured_value) as avg_value FROM experimental_results GROUP BY experiment_name ORDER BY avg_value DESC
SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(*) as num_experiments FROM experimental_results GROUP BY researcher_name HAVING num_experiments > 2
SELECT id, experiment_name FROM experimental_results WHERE experiment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM experimental_results WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM experimental_results;
SELECT id, experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experimental_results WHERE researcher_name = 'John';
SELECT experiment_name, researcher_name, experiment_date FROM experimental_results ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM nanoscale_experiments WHERE experiment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT experiment_name, COUNT(id) AS num_experiments FROM nanoscale_experiments GROUP BY experiment_name HAVING COUNT(id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM experimental_results WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experimental_results WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM experimental_results WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(*) FROM experimental_results GROUP BY researcher_name;
SELECT experiment_name, experimental_data->>'temperature' AS temperature FROM experimental_results WHERE experimental_data @> '{"pressure": 100}' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM ExperimentalResults;
SELECT ExperimentDescription, ExperimentDateTime FROM ExperimentalResults;
SELECT ResearcherName, ResearcherEmail FROM ResearcherInformation;
SELECT NanoscaleImage, NanoscaleData FROM NanoscaleExperiments;
SELECT * FROM ExperimentalResults WHERE ExperimentID = 1;
SELECT * FROM ExperimentalResults WHERE ExperimentID = 10;
SELECT ExperimentID, ExperimentDescription FROM ExperimentalResults WHERE ExperimentDateTime > '2021-10-01';
SELECT ResearcherName, ResearcherEmail FROM ResearcherInformation WHERE ResearcherAffiliation = 'University A';
SELECT * FROM ExperimentalResults ORDER BY ExperimentDateTime DESC;
SELECT NanoscaleImage FROM NanoscaleExperiments WHERE NanoExperimentID IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM ExperimentalResults;
SELECT experiment_date, researcher_name FROM ExperimentalResults WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM NanoscaleSamples ORDER BY sample_material ASC;
SELECT sample_name, sample_size FROM NanoscaleSamples WHERE sample_material = 'Nanotube';
SELECT * FROM MeasurementData WHERE measured_property = 'Temperature' ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, experiment_description FROM ExperimentalResults;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, sample_material FROM NanoscaleSamples ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MeasurementData WHERE measurement_value > 100 ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM ResearcherContacts WHERE researcher_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM ExperimentalResults e JOIN NanoscaleSamples n ON e.id = n.sample_id;
SELECT * FROM experimental_results;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM nanoscale_experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, data_name, data_value FROM experimental_data WHERE data_value > 100;
SELECT author_name, publish_date FROM research_articles WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, image_name, image_url FROM experimental_images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM experimental_results WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY experiment_date DESC, experiment_name ASC
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_description FROM experimental_results WHERE experiment_name LIKE '%DNA%'

SELECT research_articles.article_title, research_articles.author_name FROM research_articles INNER JOIN experimental_results ON research_articles.id = experimental_results.id WHERE experimental_results.experiment_name = 'DNA Sequencing'

SELECT nanoscale_experiments.researcher_name, experimental_images.image_url FROM nanoscale_experiments INNER JOIN experimental_images ON nanoscale_experiments.id = experimental_images.experiment_id ORDER BY nanoscale_experiments.experiment_date ASC
SELECT experimental_data.data_name, AVG(experimental_data.data_value) AS average_value FROM experimental_data GROUP BY data_name HAVING COUNT(experimental_data.data_value) > 10
